name: ðŸ”² Moodboard Kit 2.0
description:
Looking to easily put a moodboard together? So were we, that's why we made Moodboard Kit.


Moodboard Kit is a collection of moodboard layouts, grids, gantt charts, and slide templates that make presenting design concepts easy. Add imagery and GIFs directly to the pre-designed grids, or pull images in using Google Sheet Sync if that's your jam. It's flexible and relatively robust, so feel free to push it to the limit.


---


What's new in Moodboard Kit 2.0?

  1. New Timeline Slides
  2. New Grid Templates
  3. New Slide Templates
  4. New Text Blocks
  5. Updated Structures to make Google Sheet Sync work on any detached slide & grid instances.


See what's new on this Loom Video


Find out about how Google Sheet Sync works here.


Have fun and let us know if you have any feedback @mixpanel, @markjohnsoncc, or @mikecasebolt on Twitter.
